title: Comparisons
description: Used for site comparisons, such as products, cards, rooms, flights, etc.

xdm:count.title: Count
xdm:count.description: Count of the total number of items being compared.

items.description: Array of all items and add/remove/select actions in a comparison.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: Identifier for the item included within a comparison.

xdm:removal.title: Removal
xdm:removal.description: Tracked when an item is removed from a comparison.

xdm:addition.title: Addition
xdm:addition.description: Tracked when an item is added to a comparison.

xdm:selected.title: Selected
xdm:selected.description: Tracked when an item is selected/clicked-through upon to view more details.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Type of comparison tool in use.

xdm:view.title: View
xdm:view.description: Tracked when a comparison page is viewed.
